"use strict";

function get{{domainName}}Route() {
    return [
        {routeURL: "/{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/list/:max/:offset", templateUrl: "{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/list.html", controller: "{{domainName}}ListController"},
        {routeURL: "/{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/create", templateUrl: "{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/create.html", controller: "{{domainName}}CreateController"},
        {routeURL: "/{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/show/:id", templateUrl: "{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/show.html", controller: "{{domainName}}ShowController"},
        {routeURL: "/{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/edit/:id", templateUrl: "{{domainNameInSmallLetter}}/edit.html", controller: "{{domainName}}EditController"}
    ];
}
